title: How to Get a Date on Bin Weevils

steps.headline: Okay, first log in on a very popular server where all the 'cool' weevils are, like Grime or Grunge.
steps.description: This is were you should be able to find a boyfriend or girlfriend.

steps.headline: Secondly, everyone is more attracted to somebody who is a tycoon.
steps.description: If you are one, then get a nice hat that'll make you look gorgeous.

steps.headline: Next, go to a popular place like Dosh's palace or Flum's fountain.
steps.description: Select someone to chat up. Make sure they are single.

steps.headline: Make sure (if they are a member) you compliment their hat, it will make them like you more.
steps.description: If they say they like something, agree with them even if you hate it.

steps.headline: By then, you should be able to persuade them to go to dinner with you at Tum's diner.
After, go to Club Fling for some serious dancing.
When you have to log off, make sure you check up on your BF/GF to see if they are cheating on you.
steps.description: Do not get another date till you are officially over, they might spy on you with another account.

text: Okay, first log in on a very popular server where all the 'cool' weevils are, like Grime or Grunge. This is were you should be able to find a boyfriend or girlfriend. Secondly, everyone is more attracted to somebody who is a tycoon. If you are one, then get a nice hat that'll make you look gorgeous. Next, go to a popular place like Dosh's palace or Flum's fountain. Select someone to chat up. Make sure they are single. Make sure (if they are a member) you compliment their hat, it will make them like you more. If they say they like something, agree with them even if you hate it. By then, you should be able to persuade them to go to dinner with you at Tum's diner. Talk about everyday things there. After, go to Club Fling for some serious dancing.  When you have to log off, make sure you check up on your BF/GF to see if they are cheating on you. Do not get another date till you are officially over, they might spy on you with another account.
